attributes.action: consider dropping the proposed academy plans, and changes towards a two-tier system upon the Isle of Sheppey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government plans to eradicate the present extremely successful middle schools on the Isle of Sheppey, and amalgamate them with the failing local comprehensive to make a huge Academy consisting of over 3000 students. This will remove parents' and pupils' right of choice of schools.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
